Adding Existing Folders to a View

You can add existing StarTeam folders to a project view by moving them from a view or sharing them with other views. Both the current view and the views from which the folders are moved or shared must use the same StarTeam server configuration.

When a file is moved or shared, it may keep its absolute path or it may be given a relative path based on that of its new parent folder. If a moved folder has a relative path in its original view, it generally has a different working folder in the new view. If a shared folder has a relative path in its original view, it has a different working folder in the views that share it.

See Moving Folders or Items between Views and Sharing Folders and Items with Other Views.
